attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: James Hawker is currently a youth worker in the Dowlais area of Merthyr Tydfil .James has been a major asset to the community and his hard work ,patience , dedication  and support has made it possible for the  youth in Dowlais and surrounding areas to learn new skills ,attend activity weeks/weekends away and also a centre where these teenagers can go to interact with other teenagers ,meet new friends and upmost importantly keep them off the streets .Without a youth worker all this cannot continue .It has now been announced that the position of youth worker will come to an end by mid August .I believe this should not happen for the sake of the community and social wellbeing for our youth .Please sign this petition to keep James Hawker as youth worker for Dowlais and dont allow cut backs to ruin what our community has worked hard for .

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
